AXIS.description: Cardinal name used to compose Joystick <X> Button <Y>

BIND_AXIS_PITCH.description: Descriptive name for the Pitch axis.

BIND_AXIS_ROLL.description: Descriptive name for the Roll axis

BIND_AXIS_THRUST_FORWARD.description: Descriptive name for the ThrustForward axis

BIND_AXIS_THRUST_LEFT.description: Descriptive name for the ThrustLeft axis

BIND_AXIS_THRUST_UP.description: Descriptive name for the ThrustUp axis

BIND_AXIS_YAW.description: Descriptive name for the Yaw axis.

BIND_BOTTOM_CAMERA.description: Descriptive name for the BottomCamera action.

BIND_CAMERA_PITCH.description: Descriptive name for the Camera Pitch axis.

BIND_CAMERA_ROLL.description: Descriptive name for the Camera Roll axis

BIND_CAMERA_YAW.description: Descriptive name for the Camera Yaw axis.

BIND_CYCLE_CAMERA_MODE.description: Descriptive name for the CycleCameraMode action.

BIND_CYCLE_HOSTILES.description: Descriptive name for the CycleHostiles action.

BIND_DECREASE_TIME_ACCELERATION.description: Descriptive name for the DecreaseTimeAcceleration action.

BIND_FIXHEADING_RADIAL.description: Descriptive name for the action binding.

BIND_FLIGHT_ASSIST_RADIAL.description: Descriptive name for the action binding.

BIND_FRONT_CAMERA.description: Descriptive name for the FrontCamera action.

BIND_INCREASE_TIME_ACCELERATION.description: Descriptive name for the IncreaseTimeAcceleration action.

BIND_KILL_ROT.description: Descriptive name for the KillRot action.

BIND_LEFT_CAMERA.description: Descriptive name for the LeftCamera action.

BIND_LOOK_PITCH.description: Descriptive name for the Freelook Pitch axis.

BIND_LOOK_YAW.description: Descriptive name for the Freelook Yaw axis.

BIND_MAP_TOGGLE_SELECTION_FOLLOW_VIEW.description: Descriptive name for the MapToggleSelectionFollowView action.

BIND_MAP_WARP_TO_CURRENT_SYSTEM.description: Descriptive name for the MapWarpToCurrentSystem action.

BIND_MAP_WARP_TO_SELECTED_SYSTEM.description: Descriptive name for the MapWarpToSelectedSystem action.

BIND_PRIMARY_FIRE.description: Descriptive name for the PrimaryFire action.

BIND_RADIAL_HORIZONTAL_SELECTION.description: Input axis name to select in the radial menu.

BIND_RADIAL_VERTICAL_SELECTION.description: Input axis name to select in the radial menu.

BIND_REAR_CAMERA.description: Descriptive name for the RearCamera action.

BIND_RESET_CAMERA.description: Descriptive name for the ResetCamera action.

BIND_RESET_ORIENTATION_AND_ZOOM.description: Descriptive name for the ResetOrientationAndZoom action.

BIND_RIGHT_CAMERA.description: Descriptive name for the RightCamera action.

BIND_SECONDARY_FIRE.description: Descriptive name for the SecondaryFire action.

BIND_SPEED_CONTROL.description: Descriptive name for the SpeedControl axis.

BIND_TARGET_OBJECT.description: Descriptive name for the TargetObject action.

BIND_THRUST_LOW_POWER.description: Descriptive name for the ThrustLowPower action.

BIND_TOGGLE_CRUISE.description: Descriptive name for the action binding.

BIND_TOGGLE_HUD_MODE.description: Descriptive name for the ToggleHudMode action.

BIND_TOGGLE_LUA_CONSOLE.description: Descriptive name for the ToggleLuaConsole action.

BIND_TOGGLE_ROTATION_DAMPING.description: Descriptive name for the ToggleRotationDamping action.

BIND_TOGGLE_SPEED_LIMITER.description: Descriptive name for the action binding.

BIND_TOP_CAMERA.description: Descriptive name for the TopCamera action.

BIND_VIEW_ZOOM.description: Descriptive name for the View Zoom axis

GROUP_GENERAL_VIEW_CONTROLS.description: Header for the GeneralViewControls input group.

GROUP_MANUAL_CONTROL.description: Header for the ManualControl input group.

GROUP_SECTOR_MAP_VIEW_CONTROLS.description: Header for the SectorMapViewControls input group.

GROUP_SHIP_ORIENT.description: Header for the ShipOrient input group.

GROUP_SPEED_CONTROL.description: Header for the SpeedControl input group.

GROUP_WEAPONS.description: Header for the Weapons input group.

HAT.description: Hat switch: Is the top button on a joystick

MOUSE.description: A computer mouse, used to create the name for a mouse button binding

MOUSE_LMB.description: An acronym for the left mouse button

MOUSE_MMB.description: An acronym for the middle mouse button

MOUSE_RMB.description: An acronym for the right mouse button

PAGE_GENERAL.description: Header for the General input page.

PAGE_MAP_CONTROLS.description: Header for the MapControls input page.

PAGE_SHIP_CONTROLS.description: Header for the ShipControls input page.

PAGE_SHIP_VIEW.description: Header for the ShipView input page.

TEXT_AXIS_DEADZONE.description: Message shown for the axis deadzone slider.

TEXT_AXIS_SENSITIVITY.description: Message shown for the axis sensitivity slider.

TEXT_INVERT_AXIS.description: Message shown for the invert axis checkbox.

TEXT_KEY_BINDINGS.description: Section header for an axis or action's key bindings.

TEXT_KEY_NEGATIVE.description: Indicates the negative half of a key-binding pair.

TEXT_KEY_POSITIVE.description: Indicates the positive half of a key-binding pair.
